short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FriendTech browser app that allows you to send dividends to key holders

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of people dumping your keys? Now you have a tool to incentivize key holders to hold onto them longer!

Key Features:
- convenient key holder tracking: view the date of their initial purchase and latest sale
- create snapshots of trading fees to keep track of the collected fees from previous distributions
- monitor the total amount of received trading fees since the - last snapshot or overall.
- flexible dividend distribution: choose a percentage of the total amount, a percentage of the last snapshot, or input a custom amount
- distribute dividends based on keys or evenly among key holders
- filter key holders by the date of their initial purchase or the date of their latest sale, and/or manually exclude key holders from the distribution
- dividend distribution occurs in a single transaction through a smart contract

Payment Details:
- smart contract link: https://basescan.org/address/0x88ca915af77de0fbc8ae17f086618809ce99ac4f
- app fees may vary and will be mentioned in app during distribution process

Data collected from Friend.tech app:
- trading activity history
